text: @EricTrump Trumps need to go to the bunker. His rally was a comedy show. Clowns Pence, Lara & you were the opening act. Like the West Point graduation, there was not a lot of enthusiasm. He shared nothing presidential. No facts about racism, economy. Quit testing Covid19? Icy ramp! Haha
